pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Assessing Estimability of Linear Predictions // Provides tools for determining estimability of linear functions of regression coefficients, and 'epredict' methods that handle non-estimable cases correctly. Estimability theory is discussed in many linear-models textbooks including Chapter 3 of Monahan, JF (2008), "A Primer on Linear Models", Chapman and Hall (ISBN 978-1-4200-6201-4).
